name: proagent-devops
description: Provectus DevOps practice plugin for CI/CD pipelines, container orchestration, infrastructure as code, monitoring, incident response, and cloud operations across AWS and GCP.
author: Provectus

skills.name: devops-assistant
skills.description: Managing Infrastructure & Deployments - CI/CD pipelines, Docker/K8s, Terraform/IaC, monitoring, incident response, and cloud ops

agents.name: devops-specialist
agents.description: Senior DevOps engineer specializing in cloud infrastructure, CI/CD, containerization, Kubernetes orchestration, monitoring, and incident response

commands.name: proagent-devops
commands.description: DevOps practice hub - overview of capabilities and available operations

commands.name: proagent-devops-run
commands.description: Execute DevOps operations: deploy, provision, monitor, incident-respond, pipeline-create

commands.name: proagent-devops-review
commands.description: Review infrastructure configs, CI/CD pipelines, Dockerfiles, Kubernetes manifests, and security posture

hooks.description: Pre-deploy validation and post-deploy health checks
